long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension which prevent users from procrastinating by blocking their access to websites like youtube, facebook, and netflix. If they want to turn off the blocker, they can do it by going to the "manage extensions" section and switching the toggle off.
